1. Add user authentication endpoint
   Create a POST /api/auth/login endpoint that accepts email and password,
   validates credentials against the database, and returns a JWT token.
   Include rate limiting of 5 attempts per minute.

2. Create user profile page
   Build a React component at /profile that displays user information
   including name, email, and avatar. Add edit functionality with form
   validation.

3. Add email notification service
   Implement an email service using SendGrid that sends welcome emails
   on registration and password reset emails. Include HTML templates.
